column5: Lake home on Lake Travis. Great views of the Pedernales River and hill country from the back deck. The deck will accommodate a large group with room for relaxing and grilling. Kayak and paddleboards for your use. Large dock. Nearby attractions include Breweries, Wineries, Zip line, mountain biking, Krause Springs, restaurants, live music, golf and of course lake activities. 30 minutes west of Austin. Perfect location for those who like lake living.
